name: 3DCG
description:
Welcome to a platform adveture type of game where you will be able to complete the game by simply doing some parkour. The game is difficult too most, yet the games intentions was to be at least easy to those, and easier for those who know how to play the game and catch on how to play the game easier than it seems...

The game might have bugs and was more intended by playing from the browser instead of using the executable file. Game can be completed within 1 minute depending on if you know how to play.  5 weeks was spent on this project, game at least took 2 weeks to complete.
